General.Name: Upexi Inc.
General.Description: Upexi, Inc. manufactures and sells various branded products in the health, wellness, pet, beauty, and other markets. The company was formerly known as Grove, Inc. and changed its name to Upexi, Inc. in August 2022. Upexi, Inc. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Clearwater, Florida.
General.Address: 17129 US Hwy 19 N, Clearwater, FL, United States, 33760
